dialogue.text: So why'd you choose this restaurant?
Did you do a brick of cocaine
before coming here?
Because I didn't-
Oh I get it!
Choosing a Dutch restaurant was your
quirky way of telling me your a feminist.
Apology accepted.
I'm actually turning 25 in a...
..a..a..about a year.
I'm actually turning 25 in a...
..a..a..about a year.
I'm actually turning 25 in a...
..a..a..about a year.
Well you're not as much as an elephant as you look.
My name is Antigone
I am way too far out of league
for you to not be paying attention to me.
What's your name,
I thought it was Dumbo, but that can't be right.
What are you doing under the table?
The last person to give me the silent treatment
was my little sister,
unfortunately she did it at a very young age,
so she ended up forgetting how to speak.
That's a great impression of her!
She says one other sentence though,
which leads to me spending most of my free time
drenching menus in garlic salt-
-anyways not important!
cough cough
Someone must have ordered a really smokey steak!
Are you seriously mocking my sister?!
For your information, that sounds nothing
like her!
Someone must have ordered a really smokey steak!
More like idiot!
That's a tough question
there's been a lot of things I
struggle with in my life.
You better be playing Flappy Bird
or else I'm going to be REALLY mad at you!
But if I had to choose
just one event
My cat's death hit me really hard
A while ago
I started noticing that he wasn't as lively
as before
He stopped eating his food.
This happened on occasion and-
-the vet said he was ok,
so I didn't think much of it.
The water here is soooo deeelicious!!!
-uh, according to the vet
she..she..needed to be put down
her liver was failing to the point...
..where she couldn't eat
Uh- she was in so much pain that..that..
..euthanizing her was the best way
to relieve her suffering
..I know it's selfish of me but,
I thought it cruel of the vet
to bring that up after the autopsy.
*sob* *sob*
Fair enough
I hadn't really taken the time to process
the emotions surround the...
I don't remember the exact date,
I remember it was fall because my cat was orange
and I couldn't find my cat for a while.
*sob* Are you even paying attention?
No I'm not okay!
My day has been absolutely fantastic!
Thank you for asking.
My day has been absolutely fantastic!
Thank you for asking.
My day has been absolutely fantastic!
Thank you for asking.
Are you okay?
You look like a bat caught in a flashlight!
Uh, that's kind of a heavy topic.
When I was a kid, both my parents were working,
So I only had my cat to spend time with.
Do you remember me talking about
my cat earlier? It's the same one!
I would spend all my time with him.
And would even bring him to show and tell.
I actually didn't have a phone til I was 16,
I had to use smoke signals to get my friends
to meet me!
I fit in really well wherever I go
I'm kinda like a chameleon
This is my impression of a chameleon!
*sniff*..CHWA CHWA CHWAK
..*sniff*..CHWA CHWA CHWAK
...*sniff*..CHWA CHWA CHWAK
What about you?
Tell me about your childhood.
cough cough
Someone must have ordered a really smokey steak!
So are you ever going to.. order..?
Oh! What an explosion of flavor!
These appetizers are SO good!
They pronounce WINE-doe in the Netherlands
I'm really good at pronunciation
So... I'm pretty curtain I got this covered
I consider myself a pretty charitable person,
but I am never giving up a seat for anyone!
No matter who, no matter what the circumstance!
My nickname in highschool was 323,990 seconds
because I only accept 10 second compliments!
The seats here are so squishy!
I could slam my head into them
over and over and over...!
....uhh again! Did I say over?
